knimeNode.name: Stanford tagger
knimeNode.shortDescription: Assigns part of speech tags to terms. Suitable for German and English texts.

fullDescription.intro: This node assigns to each term of a document a part of speech (POS) tag. Therefore the Penn Treebank tag set is used when models for English texts are used (for details see http://www.cis.upenn.edu/~treebank), and the STTS tag set is used when models for German texts are used (for details see http://www.ims.uni-stuttgart.de/projekte/CQPDemos/Bundestag/help-tagset.html ). The underlying tagger model deciding what tag to assign to which term is a model of the Stanford framework (see http://nlp.stanford.edu/software/tagger.shtml for details).

ports.inPort: The input table containing the documents to tag.
ports.outPort: An output table containing the tagged documents.
